---
name: Experiment

## Hypothesis
What do you expect to be true?

## Scope
What domain does this affect? (identity, backup, AI, etc.)

## Setup
OS, tools, versions, assumptions.

## Steps
Numbered steps to reproduce.

## Observations
What worked? What didnâ€™t?

## Outcome
Succeeded / Partially / Failed

## Follow-ups
What should be documented, changed, or abandoned?
